page.title: 05ACTIVITIES FOR CHILDREN
page.content: CRANWELL R.A.F. BASE {FIRST CRANWELL CUB SCOUTS There are 32 members in our pack, which meets weekly on the R.A.F. base. Our favourite activities include making things and working to gain badges. {FIRST CRANWELL BROWNIES We have 24 brownies in our pack, which is divided into sixes. Each six has a special name, we have Gnomes, Elves, Imps and Sprites. {FIRST CRANWELL SCOUTS Our 35 members meet each Wednesday with our two leaders. Our favourite activities include building and games such as "Fox and Hounds". We camp out for a week twice a year. {FIRST CRANWELL GUIDES The girls who attend our meetings enjoy participating in plays and learning new songs.
